languages.text: "Прости, что не делаю удивленное лицо — кажется, лицевые нервы частично парализованы. Но я и так догадалась — ты все-таки не похож{mf||а} на нашу эффектную пустотную волчицу. А она обязательно явилась бы лично, будь она жива. Значит, ты — наследни{mf|к|ца}? Ну хотя бы не Кунрад".

"You'll have to excuse me for not looking surprised — my facial nerves seem to be partially paralysed. But I gathered as much — I'd hardly mistake you for our spectacular void she-wolf, after all. And if she were alive, she definitely would have come here in person. So you're the heir? Well, at least it's not Kunrad."
languages.original_text: "Прости, что не делаю удивленное лицо — кажется, лицевые нервы частично парализованы. Но я и так догадалась — ты все-таки не похож{mf||а} на нашу эффектную пустотную волчицу. А она обязательно явилась бы лично, будь она жива. Значит, ты — наследни{mf|к|ца}? Ну хотя бы не Кунрад".

traits.locale_text: "I'm sorry I'm not making a surprised face — it seems that my facial nerves are partially paralyzed. But Ii did take a guess — you don't look like our spectacular void she-wolf, after all. And were she alive, she would surely be here in person by now. So, you're the heir{mf|ess}? Well, it's not Kunrad, at least."

"I'm sorry I'm not making a surprised face — it seems that my facial nerves are partially paralyzed. But Ii did take a guess — you don't look like our spectacular void she-wolf, after all. And were she alive, she would surely be here in person by now. So, you're the heir{mf|ess}? Well, it's not Kunrad, at least."

"I'm sorry I'm not making a surprised face—my facial nerves seem to be partially paralysed. But I did take a guess: you don't look like our spectacular void she-wolf, after all. And had she been alive, she would surely be here in person by now. So, you're the heir{mf|ess}? Well, it's not Kunrad, at least."

"I'm sorry I'm not making a surprised face—my facial nerves seem to be partially paralysed. But I did take a guess: you don't look like our spectacular void she-wolf, after all. And had she been alive, she would surely be here in person by now. So, you're the heir{mf|ess}? Well, it's not Kunrad, at least."

"You'll have to excuse me for not looking surprised — my facial nerves seem to be partially paralysed. But I gathered as much — I'd hardly mistake you for our spectacular void she-wolf, after all. And if she were alive, she definitely would have come here in person. So you're the heir? Well, at least it's not Kunrad."

"You'll have to excuse me for not looking surprised — my facial nerves seem to be partially paralysed. But I gathered as much — I'd hardly mistake you for our spectacular void she-wolf, after all. And if she were alive, she definitely would have come here in person. So you're the heir? Well, at least it's not Kunrad."

languages.text: « Désolée si je n'ai pas l'air surprise, mais je crois que la plupart des nerfs de mon visage sont paralysés. Je m'en doutais un peu, vu que vous ne ressemblez pas à notre spectaculaire louve du vide. Et si elle était en vie, il ne fait aucun doute qu'elle serait venue ici en personne. Vous êtes son {mf|héritier|héritière}, alors ? Au moins, ce n'est pas Kunrad. »
languages.original_text: "You'll have to excuse me for not looking surprised — my facial nerves seem to be partially paralysed. But I gathered as much — I'd hardly mistake you for our spectacular void she-wolf, after all. And if she were alive, she definitely would have come here in person. So you're the heir? Well, at least it's not Kunrad."

traits.locale_text: « Désolée si je n'ai pas l'air surprise, mais je crois que la plupart des nerfs de mon visage sont paralysés. Je m'en doutais un peu, vu que vous ne ressemblez pas à notre spectaculaire louve du vide. Et si elle était en vie, il ne fait aucun doute qu'elle serait venue ici en personne. Vous êtes son {mf|héritier|héritière}, alors ? Au moins, ce n'est pas Kunrad. »

languages.text: «Lo siento si no pongo cara de sorpresa. Creo que tengo los nervios faciales medio paralizados. Pero me lo había imaginado; al fin y al cabo, no se parece usted a nuestra espectacular loba del vacío. Si siguiera viva, seguramente ya se habría personado aquí. Conque es usted su {mf|heredero|heredera}, ¿eh? Bueno, al menos no es Kunrad».
languages.original_text: "You'll have to excuse me for not looking surprised — my facial nerves seem to be partially paralysed. But I gathered as much — I'd hardly mistake you for our spectacular void she-wolf, after all. And if she were alive, she definitely would have come here in person. So you're the heir? Well, at least it's not Kunrad."

traits.locale_text: «Lo siento si no pongo cara de sorpresa. Creo que tengo los nervios faciales medio paralizados. Pero me puedo hacer una idea; al fin y al cabo, no se parece usted a nuestra espectacular loba del vacío. Si siguiera viva, seguramente ya se habría personado aquí. Conque es usted su {mf|heredero|heredera}, ¿eh? Bueno, al menos no es Kunrad».

languages.text: “你得原谅我，我没办法做出惊讶的表情，因为我一部分面部神经好像瘫痪了。不过我大概也猜到了，毕竟你和那头虚空母狼长得一点都不一样。而且如果她还活着，她肯定会亲自出现在这里。也就是说，你就是她的继承人？倒也挺好的，至少不是昆拉德。”
languages.original_text: "You'll have to excuse me for not looking surprised — my facial nerves seem to be partially paralysed. But I gathered as much — I'd hardly mistake you for our spectacular void she-wolf, after all. And if she were alive, she definitely would have come here in person. So you're the heir? Well, at least it's not Kunrad."

traits.locale_text: “很抱歉，我没办法做出惊讶的表情，因为我的一部分面部神经好像瘫痪了。不过我确实是没猜到，因为你看起来根本不像那头壮实的虚空母狼。如果她还活着，她现在肯定会亲自出现在这里。原来，你就是她的继承人，对吗？倒也挺好的，至少不是昆拉德。”

languages.text: 「驚いた素振りを見せられなくてすまないね。顔の神経が部分的に麻痺しているようだ。でも、推測はしていた。結局、あんたはあの貪欲なメスオオカミには見えない。もし彼女が生きていたら、間違いなく直接ここに来ているはずだ。それで、あんたが後継者なのか？まあ、少なくともクンラッドではないんだな」
languages.original_text: "You'll have to excuse me for not looking surprised — my facial nerves seem to be partially paralysed. But I gathered as much — I'd hardly mistake you for our spectacular void she-wolf, after all. And if she were alive, she definitely would have come here in person. So you're the heir? Well, at least it's not Kunrad."

traits.locale_text: 「驚いた素振りを見せられなくてすまないね。顔の神経が部分的に麻痺しているようだ。でも、推測はしていた。結局、あんたはあの貪欲なメスオオカミには見えない。もし彼女が生きていたら、間違いなく直接ここに来ているはずだ。それで、あんたが後継者なのか？まあ、少なくともクンラッドではないんだな」

languages.text: "Ihr müsst entschuldigen, dass ich kein überraschtes Gesicht mache. Einige meiner Gesichtsnerven scheinen gelähmt zu sein. Aber ich dachte mir das schon ... ich würde Euch doch nicht mit unserer spektakulären Leerenwölfin verwechseln. Und würde sie noch leben, wäre sie definitiv persönlich gekommen. Ihr seid also {mf|der Erbe|die Erbin}? Na ja, immerhin ist es nicht Kunrad."
languages.original_text: "You'll have to excuse me for not looking surprised — my facial nerves seem to be partially paralysed. But I gathered as much — I'd hardly mistake you for our spectacular void she-wolf, after all. And if she were alive, she definitely would have come here in person. So you're the heir? Well, at least it's not Kunrad."

traits.locale_text: "Tut mir leid, dass ich kein überraschtes Gesicht mache. Meine Gesichtsnerven sind offenbar teilweise gelähmt. Aber ich habe geraten: Ihr seht doch nicht aus wie unsere spektakuläre Leerewölfin. Und wäre sie am Leben, so wäre inzwischen ganz gewiss hier. Ihr seid also {mf|der Erbe|die Erbin}? Nun, zumindest ist es nicht Kunrad."

languages.text: "Şaşıramadığım için kusuruma bakma, yüz sinirlerim kısmen felç olmuş sanırım. Onu anlamıştım. Sonuçta seni dişi uçsuz kurdumuzla karıştıracak değilim. Yaşıyor olsaydı zaten buraya şahsen gelirdi. Demek sen vârissin? Neyse, en azından Kunrad değilsin."
languages.original_text: "You'll have to excuse me for not looking surprised — my facial nerves seem to be partially paralysed. But I gathered as much — I'd hardly mistake you for our spectacular void she-wolf, after all. And if she were alive, she definitely would have come here in person. So you're the heir? Well, at least it's not Kunrad."
